title: Fort Davis National Historic Site: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases       INTERMOUNTAIN REGION NEWS RELEASE Barney Riley Named Superintendent of Fort Davis NHS 2016 Fort Davis NHS Will Increase Entrance Fees Beginning August 12, 2015 Fort Davis National Historic Site Proposes Entrance Fee Increase and Revises Fee Structure Fort Davis NHS Opens Newly Restored Visitor Center and Museum New Post Hospital Exhibits April 9, 2012 (photos: 1 & 2) National Park Week 2011 Fort Davis Receives 49-acres from The Conservation Fund John Morlock Named Superintendent of Fort Davis National Historic Site
